snippet.title: Midnight Scenes: The Goodbye Note. A short game by Octavi Navarro.
snippet.description:
Looking for a short, spooky adventure game to play this Halloween season?
Get the second episode of Midnight Scenes:
On Steam:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1382730/Midnight_Scenes_The_Goodbye_Note/
On GOG:
https://www.gog.com/en/game/midnight_scenes_episode_2_special_edition
On Itch.io:
https://octavinavarro.itch.io/midnight-scenes-the-goodbye-note

Follow me on:
Bluesky - https://www.octavinavarro.bsky.social
Facebook - http://www.facebook.com/octavinavarroAG
Instagram - https://www.instagram.com/octavi_navarro
